Package model.cards

Class WeaponCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.cards.Card
      • model.cards.UsableCard
        • model.cards.WeaponCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class WeaponCard
extends UsableCard
    This class represents a Weapon. A weapon has always an id a cost and a list of effects used to validate and execute it
    See Also:

        Returns:
        the entire cost of the weapon

      • getRechargeCost

        public AmmoQuantity getRechargeCost()
        Return the cost to use the Weapon depending on it's state
        Returns:
        an array of Ammo which is the recharging Cost of the Weapon

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus​(WeaponState status)
        Sets the state of the Weapon
        Parameters:
        status - the State to put the Weapon

      • status

        public int status()
        Returns:
        the State of the Weapon: CHARGED = 0, UNCHARGED = 1, SEMI_CHARGED = 2

      • isRechargeable

        public boolean isRechargeable()
        Returns:
        true if the Weapon is isRechargeable, otherwise false

      • recharge

        public void recharge()
              throws WeaponAlreadyChargedException
        Method used to recharge a Weapon
        Throws:
        WeaponAlreadyChargedException - exception thrown in case the weapon is already charged

      • use

        public void use​(EffectRequest request)
         throws NotEnoughAmmoException,
                WeaponNotChargedException
        Main method called by the player who wants to use this weapon. It parses the command obtaining what he needs to verify first things of a shooting session: which is the effect used, if it can be payed and if the player uses powerups to pay it
        Specified by:
        use in class UsableCard
        Parameters:
        request - is the request that comes from the controller to execute the FIRE action
        Throws:
        WeaponNotChargedException - in case the weapon can not be used because not charged
        NotEnoughAmmoException - in case the weapon even with powerups can not be payed

      • payRechargeCost

                     throws WeaponAlreadyChargedException,
                            NotEnoughAmmoException
        Throws:
        WeaponAlreadyChargedException
        NotEnoughAmmoException
